text.content:
There are three ways to obtain the powers of a demon:

  • By trading them: You agree to perform a service or offer something of value to the demon in exchange for its powers. Once the service has been rendered (or a promise made to render the service made), you can obtain the demon's powers.

  • By stealing them: If you have the Rogue class, you can choose to steal a demon's powers instead of their spiritual treasure or IP.

  • By extorting them: When you personally reduce a demon to 0 HP, instead of describing how you put this demon out of play you can leave this narration to the GM, demanding that this demon offer you their powers in exchange.

Note the demon's weaknesses, resistances, immunities, absorptions and traits. Demons can't take back the powers you've obtained from them (even if you don't keep your promises).
